Package com.ooad.hw1.engine

Class PowerUp

java.lang.Object
com.ooad.hw1.engine.Sprite
com.ooad.hw1.engine.Collidable
com.ooad.hw1.engine.PowerUp
Direct Known Subclasses:
JumpPowerUp, PowerUpDecorator, x1Multiplier
public abstract class PowerUp extends Collidable
PowerUp abstract class do certain power ups to the main character. If main character collides with it, these methods take action. It is decorator design pattern. This is above abstract class and there is JumpPowerUp and x1Multiplier concrete classes. And to decorate this concrete classes there is PowerUpDecorator abstract class. And below that there is A, B, C type decorator classes

  • Method Details

    • calculateMultiplier

      public abstract long calculateMultiplier()
      To calculate multiplied powerUps, i used decorator design pattern. Every decorator objects has decorator object that is collected before it. So, it does recursively multiply decorators multipliers.
      Returns:
      current multiplier

    • getMultiplier

      public long getMultiplier()
      Returns current decorator's multiplier.
      Returns:
      current decorator's multiplier.
